SHEET PAN BREAKFAST BAKE SQUARES

Meal prep made easy! These portable breakfast bake squares are loaded with eggs, vegetables, and turkey sausage. Cut into 12 perfect squares for grab-and-go mornings.

28g
Protein
220
Calories
50m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 square

Carbs8g
Fat14g
Fiber2g
Sugar3g
Sodium420mg
DifficultyEasy

MEAL PREP INFO

Batch Size

12 servings

Storage

Fridge: 5 days
Freezer: 2 months

Reheat Options

Microwave: 60-90 seconds Heat until warmed through....
Oven: 10-12 min ...

INGREDIENTS

  • 454g (1 lb) turkey breakfast sausage
  • 12 large eggs
  • 240ml (1 cup) unsweetened almond milk
  • 200g baby spinach
  • 1 red bell pepper, diced
  • 150g mushrooms, sliced
  • 1 medium onion, diced
  • 115g (1 cup) shredded cheddar cheese
  • 3g garlic powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prep Pan

Preheat oven to 375F. Line a 9x13 baking pan with parchment paper and spray with cooking spray.

2

Cook Sausage and Veggies

In a large skillet, cook turkey sausage until browned. Add peppers, onion, and mushrooms. Cook 5 minutes. Add spinach and cook until wilted.

3

Make Egg Mixture

Whisk eggs, almond milk, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a large bowl.

4

Assemble

Spread sausage mixture evenly in prepared pan. Pour egg mixture over top. Sprinkle with cheese.

5

Bake

Bake 35-40 minutes until eggs are set and top is golden. Let cool 10 minutes before cutting into 12 squares.
